original_title: Pittsburgh is Home: The Story of the Penguins
overview: The story of the Pittsburgh Penguins; from their beginnings as a team epitomizing bad luck in the NHL to their rebirth and multifaceted redemption by Mario Lemieux, and their now current success by way of Sidney Crosby. This is the story of Pittsburgh's most unlikely addition to the city of champions.
title: Pittsburgh is Home: The Story of the Penguins
